casebody.data:
In the Matter of DISCIPLINE OF Howard Neil SHIPLEY. No. D-2827. Supreme Court of the United States Dec. 8, 2014.

Opinion

Howard Neil Shipley, of Washington, District of Columbia, is ordered to show cause, within 40 days, why he should not be sanctioned for his conduct as a member of the Bar of this Court in connection with the petition No. 14-424, Sigram Schindler Beteiligungsgesellschaft MBH v. Lee .
